name: Dr. Malika Fassi-Fihri
description: Dr. Malika Fassi-Fihri is a prominent veterinarian and scientist from Morocco, known for her contributions to veterinary medicine and public health. She is particularly recognized for her work in the field of animal diseases and epidemiology. As an expert in veterinary public health, Dr. Fassi-Fihri has worked extensively on improving animal health in Morocco and developing strategies to combat zoonotic diseases, which are diseases that can be transmitted from animals to humans. Her groundbreaking research has had a significant impact on veterinary practices in Morocco and beyond, contributing to the improvement of animal welfare and public health.
